metadata.title: CVE-2024-22017 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: setuid() does not affect libuv's internal io_uring operations ifinitialized before the call to setuid(). This allows the process to performprivileged operations despite presumably having dropped such privilegesthrough a call to setuid(). This vulnerability affects all users usingversion greater or equal than Node.js 18.18.0, Node.js 20.4.0 and Node.js21.

criterions.comment: nodejs package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
